Name: Pinecone Game
About the game: Welcome to Pinecone Game, where you can plunge into the wonderful world of throwing pinecones into a well! Throw pinecones into the well - just pick up a pinecone and throw it into the well in the middle of your flying island. The new pine cone will be available in 24 hours. Take a look at the leaderboard - find out how many pinecones your friends and other players from all over the world have thrown into the well. Sit down and rest - while waiting for a new pinecone, you can sit on a specially equipped bench and relax, contemplating the surrounding nature. WARNING! For your safety, do not climb over the fences of the flying island, or hang over the walls of the well.
Meta Title: Pinecone Game: Dec 30, 2021, Frameblade and Full Overview
